name: Microscope Simulation
description:
Part 001 of my endeavour to make one small game each week in order to learn stuff and explore ideas. With the focus being on learning and exploring stuff. Not on making funny games.

With this game I learned about Poission Disk Sampling and Voronoi Diagrams. And I finally got a stencil shader to work properly. And I learned something about the way Itch.io likes its gifs.

Known Bugs:

  • Particles might wander off sporadically, leaving the cell structure
  • It is possible to zoom further in or out than originally anticipated by pressing the corresponding button while the revolver-animation is playing
